title: Repeat alarm turns off for future when I swipe right
content:
I have a Repeat Alarm set up on my Google Pixel 4a.

When the alarm sounds, I swipe right to dismiss, and get a pop-up message "Alarm Off". But this seems to switch off the alarm completely, in the Clock App. It has switched off and will not sound tomorrow.

How do I change this behaviour? I want to switch off the alarm right now; I do not want to switch it off permanently for the future. 

I have checked the setting according to the below link, and cannot resolve this problem:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/2840926?hl=en

Thanks & Regards,
AKnn
